resources.string: Task Manager Boladao
Mobile Data Alert
Mobile Data Alert
Activate to be notified if you have mobile data on when using Wifi
Turn Off Mobile Data
Remember to turn off mobile data
Turn Off GPS When not using
GPS Alert
Activate to be notified if you forgot to turn off GPS
Turn Off GPS
Are u using GPS? if not, remember to turn it off
Turn Off Bluetooth When not using
Bluetooth Alert
Activate to be notified if you forgot to turn off bluetooth
Turn Off Bluetooth
Are u using Bluetooth? if not, remember to turn it off
Turn Off Wifi When leave home
Wifi Alert
Activate to be notified if you forget to turn off wifi after leaving home
Not at home? Turn Off Wifi
Are u using wifi? if not, remember to turn it off
